blockchain.name: Bank Vaults
blockchain.desc:
Bank Vaults is a liquid staking protocol where users can store funds and earn yeild in the form of yeild tokens. The owners has assured me it is secured and no rug pull can occur and users funds are locked in. Can you prove them wrong?

Author: MaanVad3r

blockchain.name: Death Star 2.0
blockchain.desc:
The Death Start is under development but the darkside ran out of funds, so they reached out to the public to help. Can you stop the Death Star from being developed?

Author: MaanVad3r

blockchain.name: Dungeons and Naga
blockchain.desc:
The developer of this protocol really loves the movie so he decided to build a decentralized game out of it that lives on chain. He has spent all his life saving and really want the game to succeed. The game sets you on an adventure to find hidden treasure.

Author: MaanVad3r

blockchain.name: Gentleman
blockchain.desc:
Gentleman is a get rich pyramind scheme with pump and dump token but there is a vulnerability in it. Can you guys find the exploit and become the real Gentleman.

Author: MaanVad3r

blockchain.name: Guess it
blockchain.desc:
Santa Clause has been kidnapped and is kept in a secret dungeon, can u unlock this contract and save him?

Author: MaanVad3r

crypto.name: Credentials
crypto.desc:
We found a leak of a blackmarket website's login credentials. Can you find the password of the user osman and successfully decrypt it?

Author: Alhfs

crypto.name: Hohoho 3
crypto.desc:
Santa Claus is coming to town! Send your wishes by connecting to the netcat service!

use [nc IP PORT]

Author: SKR

crypto.name: Hohoho 3 continue
crypto.desc:
Someone broke the service! Now everyone can only register once..

use [nc IP PORT]

Author: SKR

crypto.name: RickS Algorithm
crypto.desc:
My friend Rick designed an alogrithm that is super secure! Feel free to try it!

use [nc IP PORT]

Author: SKR

crypto.name: RickS Algorithm 2
crypto.desc:
Someone crack our algorithm! We fixed it, hopefully its secure now..

use [nc IP PORT]

Author: SKR

forensic.name: I Cant Manipulate People
forensic.desc:
Partial traffic packet captured from hacked machine, can you analyze the provided pcap file to extract the message from the packet perhaps by reading the packet data?

Author: Ap0k4L1p5

forensic.name: Oh Man
forensic.desc:
We received a PCAP file from an admin who suspects an attacker exfiltrated sensitive data. Can you analyze the PCAP file and uncover what was stolen?

Zip Password: wgmy

Author: h0j3n

forensic.name: Unwanted Meow
forensic.desc:
Uh.. Oh.. Help me, I just browsing funny cats memes, when I click download cute cat picture, the file that been download seems little bit wierd. I accidently run the file making my files shredded. Ughh now I hate cat meowing at me.

Author: 4jai

misc.name: Christmas GIFt
misc.desc:
Here is your christmas GIFt from santa! Just open and wait for it..

Author: SKR

misc.name: Invisible Ink
misc.desc:
The flag is hidden somewhere in this GIF. You can't see it? Must be written in transparent ink.

Author: Yes

misc.name: Watermarked
misc.desc:
Got this from social media, someone said it's watermarked, is it?

Author: zx

pwn.name: Scanner
pwn.desc:
This custom scanner by some company you never heard of, uses an unusual protocol. I wonder if its pwnable?

Author: Yes

pwn.name: screenwriter
pwn.desc:
Use our software to craft your next blockbuster hit!

use [nc IP PORT]

Author: Ren

rev.name: Drivers
rev.desc:
I downloaded these drivers which grants me more ram Though, it seems that its not working as expected, Could it be a virus?? Please help me!

Zip Password: wgmy

Author: Catz

rev.name: Stones
rev.desc:
When Thanos snapped his fingers, half of the flag was blipped. We need the Avengers to retrieve the other half.

There's no flag in the movie, but there is a slash flag on the server

(Please do not perform any brute forcing, enumeration, or scanning. Not useful nor needed)

Author: KD_Kasturi

rev.name: Sudoku
rev.desc:
Easy stuff, frfr. You dont need to brute force or guess anything.

The final flag don't have any dot (.)

rev.name: VirtualBox
rev.desc:
Is this how virtualized execution works?

web.name: Code Sharing
web.desc:
Share with us your masterpiece safely, with Codespace Trust™ built in!

web.name: Dear Admin
web.desc:
Capture the admin's heart with your poetic words, and they might share their secrets in return. 🎭

web.name: Wizards Chamber
web.desc:
Can you craft the right incantation to reveal the hidden flag?

Author: h0j3n

web.name: WordMarket
web.desc:
I’ve set up a WordPress eCommerce site for a client. Can you check if it’s secure enough for production? Give it a look and see if anything stands out.
